{"id":831198992,"question_id":3,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1666848541,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"41 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/831198992/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        bitset<127>tmp;\n        int cur0 = 0, cur1 = 0;\n        int ans = 0;\n        while(cur1 - s.size()){\n            bitset<127>tmp1, tmp2; \n            tmp1.set(s[cur1]), tmp2.set(s[cur0]);\n            if((tmp ^ tmp1).count() > tmp.count()){\n                tmp ^= tmp1;\n                if(cur1 - s.size()) cur1++;\n            }\n            else tmp ^= tmp2, cur0++;\n            ans = max(ans, cur1 - cur0);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
